rules_text: If an opponent has more life than you, you gain 4 life. If an opponent controls more lands than you, create a Treasure token. If an opponent controls more creatures than you, create two 1/1 green Rabbit creature tokens.
flavor_text: [i]As they made the grueling climb, Eiyo and Alexa found themselves reliant on the other's talents. Neither could do this alone.[/i]
